title: Slottsskogen/Godhem IF
text:
Slottsskogen/Godhem IF, abbreviated SG97, is a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="association%20Football">football</a> club located in <a href="G%C3%B6teborg">Göteborg</a>. The club was founded in 1997.
Background.
Since their foundation Slottsskogen/Godhem IF has participated mainly in the middle divisions of the <a href="Swedish%20football%20league%20system">Swedish football league system</a>. The club currently plays in Division 4 Göteborg which is the sixth tier of Swedish football. They play their home matches at the Ruddalen in Göteborg.
Slottsskogen/Godhem IF are affiliated to the <a href="G%C3%B6teborgs%20Fotbollf%C3%B6rbund">Göteborgs Fotbollförbund</a>.
